channel.title: Documentation on Jamstack Themes
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Jamstack Themes

item.title: 11ty documentation template using Tailwind CSS
item.description: Eleventy documentation template using Tailwind CSS An 11ty documentation site theme, built with Tailwind CSS.

item.title: Jekyll LibDoc
item.description: A documentation theme with its playground LibDoc is a Jekyll theme that was crafted to easily and quickly get properly designed documentation especially for CSS and Javascript libraries.

item.title: NextJS-based changelog theme for your product
item.description: ProductLog is a NextJS theme for hosting your product’s changelog Features SEO friendly Excellent Lighthouse score Mobile-friendly view Support Notion as source (Sample Notion Page) Built-in Analytics: Google Analytics, Plausible and Simple analytics Next image optimization Easy styling customization with Tailwind v2 Syntax highlighting KaTeX support

item.title: J1 Template Starter
item.description: A fully configurable Jekyll Theme Fully Responsive. J1 Template supports modern web browsers on all devices for best results on PCs, Tablets, and SmartPhones.

item.title: Next Smooth Doc
item.description: NEXTJS SMOOTH DOC A minimal doc generator based on Next.js & mdx.

item.title: Doks
item.description: Build on Hyas Get all the Hyas goodness: Security aware Fast by default ‚ö°Ô∏è SEO-ready Development tools (linting, cleaning) Bootstrap framework Netlify-ready (functions, redirects, headers) Plus Full text search ‚Äî using FlexSearch üöÄ Page layouts (landing page, blog, documentation layout) Dark mode ‚Äî switch to a low-light UI with the click of a button And 100 scores on Google Lighthouse A+ scores on Mozilla Observatory Get started There are two main ways to get started with Doks:

item.description: English | ÁÆÄ‰Ωì‰∏≠Êñá Eureka Eureka is a feature-rich and highly customizable Hugo theme.

item.title: Hugo Theme Zdoc
item.description: Hugo Theme Zdoc Zdoc is a documentation theme for Hugo. It looks simple and provide many shortcodes.

item.title: Bulma Clean Theme
item.description: Bulma clean theme works with GitHub Pages and has a wide range of page layout available to use.

item.title: Ace documentation
item.description: Ace documentation theme for Hugo Ace documentation offers a feature-complete documentation theme for Hugo, powered by Bootstrap 4.

item.title: Friday Theme
item.description: About Friday Theme is a theme for Jekyll using Bootstrap 4.
